about_the_game:
Eternal Vault protects your goods through time and space.
They can't be attacked, hacked or stolen.
They don't age and they are constantly updated.
We offer different level of security depending the value of your goods.

The Eternal Vaults are all of this except that you discovered a way to find owners of the Eternal Vaults, and they can be "hacked". Travel in time and be them the time to stole the content of their Eternal Vault and bring it back to your lair! Gather all those precious treasures, the money and find even more rich Eternal Vault owners! That's the plan!

CURRENTLY IN THE DEMO:
- Very small lair with few elements to build!
- Three Eternal Vault owners to discover in different era and places.
- Five different obstacles (with many variations).
- One level of difficulty.

name: Eternal Vault Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Eternal Vault is an action/adventure game where you travel through time and space to rob precious money and unique items from their owner! But don't wait, your time is limited!
